  prototype={<>LoongArchSubtarget &amp; LoongArchSubtarget::initializeSubtargetDependencies (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp; TT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> CPU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> TuneCPU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ABIName)</>}>
Initializes using the passed in CPU and feature strings so that we can use initializer lists for subtarget initialization.
